282084CA.Line7.8C8DF: I need a flower to treat it... the ghost palm. It grows near those old bones. Bring one back to me, would you?

5A431844.Line1.8C8DF: Thank Akarat for you... I'd shake your hand, but my arm, you see... We were on our way to Tarsarak when that demon attacked.

8E2C0B48.Line5.8C8DF: (chuckle) I was lucky, to a point... I managed to slay one of the creatures, but it got its fangs in me. The venom... is not pleasant.

9729EAF7.VoiceDir7.8C8DF: Wounded/in pain, downplaying both. Putting on a brave face.

C94C7E71.VoiceDir1.8C8DF: Wounded/in pain. (arm bitten by demon) Relieved to see Player.

FD357175.VoiceDir5.8C8DF: Wounded/in pain, downplaying both. Putting on a brave face.
